name: rationale-generator-parent
description: Parent project for Rationale Generator and Admin Panel

scripts.install-all: npm install && npm run install-admin && npm run install-rationale
scripts.install-admin: cd admin_web && npm install && npm run install-frontend
scripts.install-rationale: cd rationale_gen && npm install && npm run install-frontend
scripts.build: npm run build-admin && npm run build-rationale
